name: Low-Poly Practice
description:
Some skills practice creating animated low-poly character models
using only free or open-source tools.        
           
           
   

Some skills practice creating animated low-poly character models
using only free or open-source tools. 

I created the models in Blender using concept art by Ryan Jones as a reference.
The model textures were created using Krita.
The models were rigged and animated using Mixamo. 
 
 

T o o l s

Blender (blender.org)
Mixamo (mixamo.com)
Krita (krita.org)
 

T u t o r i a l s

How to Create a Low Poly Character in Blender 2.8
by CG Geek

Create a Low Poly Person in Blender 2.8
by Grant Abbit

Low Poly Character Modelling, Rigging and Animating | Blender + Mixamo
by Jame Studios
